meanings.definition: The condition in which things are happening or being done.
meanings.sent1: During the party, various activities kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent2: Playing games and chatting with friends are common activities at a birthday celebration.
meanings.sent3: The activities of the mischievous squirrel made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The activities of the busy ants resembled a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful charts to make the activities in the classroom more engaging.

meanings.definition: Things that are done for enjoyment, often as a group.
meanings.sent1: Outdoor activities like hiking and picnicking are popular in the summer.
meanings.sent2: Participating in team sports is a great way to enjoy group activities.
meanings.sent3: The activities organized by the club were always a hit with the members.
meanings.sent4: The activities of the dance troupe were like a synchronized symphony of movement.
meanings.sent5: The children's faces lit up with joy as they engaged in the fun activities at the carnival.
